title: Free Agency Speculation SZN Is in Full Swing | Heat Check
description:
With the start of free agency right around the corner, everyone is wondering where some of the league’s biggest stars will end up (3:55). Plus: Draft additions make a handful of young teams (hint: one of the teams has Zion Williamson on it) instantly exciting to watch (34:06).

Host: John Gonzalez
Guests: Dan Devine, Danny Chau

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
